ygData.subject: Re: Okay I have a few questions
ygData.msgSnippet: The pieces of mallet head and handle are part of the Thex Mallet quest.  It is basically an evil quest because the NPCs you need to talk to are dark elves.
ygData.messageBody:
The pieces of mallet head and handle are part of the Thex Mallet quest. It is basically an evil quest because the NPCs you need to talk to are dark elves. There is a third piece on the zombie Commander Windstream in Befallen (level 20+ zombie), but to assemble the pieces you have to go to Neriak. I dont have the stats on hand, but you can find it in EQ`Lizer (http://www.gamez.net/eq) and people I know who have it say its more useful in the throwing slot because it gives +sv magic I believe.
Allsar Olath`Vlos - Rathe
-----Original Message-----

Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Okay I have a few questions


First I was in the lower lvl of befallen and in about 1hr i got two pieces of some kind of mallet the head and the handle what other pieces do i need,what where do i take it to be built,and what are its stats?(compared to the screaming mace) also what is this peace keeper staff about can i have info on hopw to start the quest and who to talk ot and where the stuff can be found.

THANKS,
KRIX MATHER
